snippet.title: Cultist Astronaut - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Cultist Astronaut is a 2D action adventure that takes place in a cult infested solar system. In this game, you can travel to different planets corrupted by cults. Your mission is to destroy opposing cults and unify the universe under the old gods! 

WISHLIST CULTIST ASTRONAUT ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1834700/Cultist_Astronaut/

PLAY THE GAME
https://infinitive-game-studios.itch.io/cultist-astronaut

If you like classic shooter platformers, then this game is for you.

✦ Website - http://www.infinitivegames.com/
✦ Twitter - https://twitter.com/GameInfinitive
✦ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/infinitiveg...
✦ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/InfinitiveGames
✦ Games - https://infinitive-game-studios.itch.io/

Music by TeknoAxe: https://www.youtube.com/c/teknoaxe

#unity #unity3d #unity3dgames #CultistAstronaut #gamedev #indiedev #gamedesign #bossfight
